lead_paragraph: Nearly all of the 82 municipal courts in St. Louis County have agreed to a uniform standard for fines and court costs.

headline.main: Missouri: St. Louis County Courts Standardize Fines
headline.print_headline: Missouri: St. Louis County Courts Standardize Fines

snippet: Nearly all of the 82 municipal courts in St. Louis County have agreed to a uniform standard for fines and court costs.
